definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: Of course, microwavable meals are nice when you worked late or are just way too busy.
sentences.chinese: 當然，要是下班太晚或太忙，微波爐蒸肉也不錯。

sentences.english: Lead in sheath heater of Microwaves.
sentences.chinese: 微波爐發熱器護套中的鉛。

sentences.english: Galanz just about a week ago and the National US-held section of microwave ovens .
sentences.chinese: 格蘭仕大約一週前剛剛與國美合作舉行微波爐節。

sentences.english: It takes the microwave time to warm up your dinner enough to unfreeze it.
sentences.chinese: 微波爐需要花一點時間才能將溫度調到足夠解凍它。

sentences.english: I have been using a Galanz oven all along, and can tell you that it is quality-guaranteed.
sentences.chinese: 我一直使用格蘭仕牌微波爐，質量很有保證。

sentences.english: I'll put the lasagne in the oven to warm it up.
sentences.chinese: 我把意大利麪放在微波爐裏熱一下。

sentences.english: Just heat up the food in the microwave.
sentences.chinese: 把食物放在微波爐裏熱熱就行了。

sentences.english: Cover and microwave on hight for 4 minutes, stirring once.
sentences.chinese: 蓋蓋微波爐高火轉4分鐘，中途攪拌一次。

sentences.english: Heat water in a glass bowl in the microwave for about one minute with a high setting.
sentences.chinese: 熱水在微波爐玻璃碗約一個具有高設置分鐘。

sentences.english: The micro wave oven makes a continuous buzzing noise.
sentences.chinese: 微波爐老是發出滋滋聲。

sentences.english: I think the best way to achieve perfectly uniform gooey deliciousness is to nuke it.
sentences.chinese: 若是要均勻的溶化棉花糖，最好的方法就是微波爐了。

sentences.english: Cooking in a microwave oven takes less time and energy.
sentences.chinese: 用微波爐烹調，省時省力。

sentences.english: If you buy a refrigerator, we will throw in a microwave oven.
sentences.chinese: 如果你買一臺電冰箱，我們免費贈送一臺微波爐。

sentences.english: He bought a microwave oven9 a10 to a CD player.
sentences.chinese: 除了CD唱機外，他還買了一臺微波爐。

sentences.english: Freeze food and use a microwave to heat it, which uses less energy than cooking from scratch.
sentences.chinese: 冷凍食品和使用微波爐加熱，使用不到從頭炊事能源。

sentences.english: Grapes explode when you put them in the microwave.
sentences.chinese: 如將葡萄放置在微波爐內葡萄將會爆開。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
